name: Jenkins
description: Leading open-source automation server for CI/CD pipelines.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  jenkins:
    image: jenkins/jenkins:lts
    container_name: jenkins
    restart: unless-stopped
    user: root
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:8080"
      - "{{AGENT_PORT}}:50000"
    volumes:
      - {{JENKINS_HOME}}:/var/jenkins_home
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
    environment:
      - JENKINS_OPTS=--prefix=/jenkins
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=jenkins"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=development"

notes: Initial admin password can be found in logs or jenkins_home/secrets/initialAdminPassword
Docker socket mounted for building Docker images
